name: Beet, Pear and Goat Cheese Salad with Grilled Chicken
description: Beets are a great source of folic acid, potassium, calcium and antioxidants (betacyanin), which gives them their rich red colour.

ingredients.name: Rotisserie Chicken or Lemon Garlic Chicken

preparation: Fill serving bowl with greens and top with beets, pears, onion and chicken.
Drizzle with Vinaigrette and gently toss. Top with goat cheese and serve.

products.name: Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: The days of dry oven-roasted chicken that takes forever to make are over! There’s a better way, and it’s quick, juicy, and oh-so-tasty with Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning. In 20 minutes, you can cook a whole chicken in the microwave using the Round Steamer. With a flavour that outshines the store-bought kin —free of unnecessary additives and too much sodium—Rotisserie Chicken is so fast and easy it’s perfect for any night of the week!

products.name: Lemon Garlic Chicken Seasoning (3pk)
summary: With just the right amount of garlic and a citrus squeeze, this seasoning makes it easy to cook a whole juicy chicken in the microwave in just 20 minutes using a Multipurpose Steamer. This is one of those ‘set it and forget it’ meals that works well for a weeknight dinner or a dinner party.

products.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Mix
summary: A classic for a reason, this dressing mix is full of flavour and uber versatile. Use it as salad or nourish bowl dressing, marinade protein including chicken and beef, or glaze grilled veggies and fresh fruit. Any way you serve it, it’s sure to be a hit!
